name: Bowling Islands
description:
Control is very simple!
Pull the throwing cursor back to "THROW" and release it!
Then, flick the ball to create curve.
Use this technique, and aim the points.

GameCenter:
If you Login to "GameCenter", you can able to earn achievements!
Also, in particular missions, you can compete with other players in ranking!
Let's aim the seat of Number One Bowler!
